descriptions.en:
Spawns a [heavy]Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.
Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.
Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.
Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ [primary]Primary Weapons: 4.25x
‚Ä¢ [special]Special Weapons: 1.05x
‚Ä¢ Exotic [primary]Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?‚Å†x)
Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.
Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Grants 20% Damage Resistance while overcharging a [Void]‚Å†Void Grenade with [Void]‚Å†Chaos Accelerant.
Grenade Hits grant [pve]2000% [pvp][1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
4 second cooldown between Activations.
Charged [Void]‚Å†Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.

On Class Ability Usage with 1|2+ Mods equipped:
Collects Orbs of Power within 12.5|18.5 meters.
Also collects Motes of Light in Gambit as well as Crests in Supremacy.

Weapon or Grenade Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.
Damage Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%

Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
[pve]PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
[pvp]PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage
The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.
Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While within 15 metres of an ally:
Grants a Stack of Nano-Munitions every 3 seconds, up to the maximum of 7. Consuming a Stack restarts the timer.
Consumes a Stack upon emptying the magazine to refill 25% of it.
Readying a Power Weapon removes all Stacks.

After Aiming Down Sights for [enh]1.4 seconds without firing, for one shot:
‚Ä¢ 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
‚Ä¢ Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5xü†ö2.5x)
Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.
The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)
[enh] Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.
Each stack of Gathering Light improves this weapon's reload, handling, and target acquisition.

Special Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.
Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.
Grants a [pve]20% [pvp][15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.
Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.
If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
Damaging an opponent temporarily increases speed and handling.
Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.
The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
‚Ä¢ Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
‚Ä¢ Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds
Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | [pve]25% [pvp][20%] | 35% | 50%
Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.
Remains active while stowed.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.
10|5|1 second cooldown between activations with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.
Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.
Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 20 Range
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 50 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | 30? Stability
‚Ä¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | ? Handling
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 55 Charge Rate (Swords)
‚Ä¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 Guard Resistance (Swords)
Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ [primary]Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
‚Ä¢ [special]Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
‚Ä¢ [heavy]Power Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201
Each damage instance (Weapon Hit) grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank.
Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
‚Ä¢ Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
‚Ä¢ Enemy Players: 10 Points
Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
‚Ä¢ [primary]Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
‚Ä¢ Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst) after 3.1 seconds of not firing the weapon:
‚Ä¢ 20 Aim Assist and 25 Range
‚Ä¢ 5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 10% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth
[special]Special weapons only receive 50% of the benefits. Stats are rounded up.
Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Passively grants the [overload]Overload Shot buff to Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type and increases their damage against [overload]Overload Champions by 80%.
Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.
[overload]Overload Shots/effects apply [overload]Disruption for [pve]6.5 [pvp][5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns [overload]Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.
Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Breaking a PVE Combatant's Shield with a [Stasis]Stasis or [Strand]Strand Weapon has a chance to [Stasis]Freeze (if [Stasis]Stasis Weapon) or [Strand]Suspend (if [Strand]Strand Weapon) them.
Wearing seasonal armor improves the chances of the perk triggering.
Killing a Frozen PVE Combatant spawns a [Stasis]Stasis Crystal close to the target's location. Bosses spawn 2 [Stasis]Crystals.
Dealing [Solar]Solar Ability Damage to Bosses and Champions [Void]Weakens them for 6 seconds.
Picking up an Orb of Power grants [Strand]Unraveling Rounds for [pve]7 [pvp][5] seconds.

Only works in PvE game modes.
Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to [Solar]Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.
Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.
By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.
[enh] Passively grants 5 Handling.

Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by damage Falloff.
[pve][PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.
[pvp][PvP] Don't want to talk about it.
[enh] Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for [pve]5 [pvp][3] seconds.
Duration cannot be refreshed.
Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
‚Ä¢ Sidearms: 12
‚Ä¢ SMGs: 13

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for [pve]5 [pvp][3] seconds.
Duration cannot be refreshed.
Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
‚Ä¢ Sidearms: 12
‚Ä¢ SMGs: 13

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Onslaught for 4.5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.
Benefits at 1|2|3 Stacks of Onslaught:
‚Ä¢ 16% | 28% | 37% decreased Firing Delay
‚Ä¢ 15 | 25 | 35 Reload Speed

Grants the following to [Strand]Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants the following to [Arc]Arc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon scoring a Precision Kill or 3 kills within 3 seconds of each:
Spawns a [Strand]Threadling on Enemy Death Location.
[enh] Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a [Void]Void or [Strand]Strand Weapon.
Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.
Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 11 seconds.
Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
‚Ä¢ [Stasis]Winter's Shroud and [Strand]Threaded Specter Aspects
‚Ä¢ Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods
[Strand]Ensnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.

Finishing a reload overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% of the Base Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for each ally within 15 meters.
Overfill amount maxes out at 50%.

On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large [Stasis]Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.
[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium [Stasis]Stasis Crystal.
5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Powered Hits grant 3% increased damage for [enh]4 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.
Blocking removes all stacks.
[enh] Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
‚Ä¢ [primary]Primary Weapons: [enh]40%
‚Ä¢ [special]Special and [heavy]Power Weapons: [enh]25%
[enh] Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.
Rockets deal [pve]22.4 [pvp][14] impact and [pve]24 [pvp][15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional damage increase.
% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
‚Ä¢ Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% increased damage (Baseline)
‚Ä¢ Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
‚Ä¢ Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
‚Ä¢ Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
‚Ä¢ Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%
Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

Precision Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to [pve]123.89 [pvp][95.3] elemental damage in a 4.5 meter radius.
Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
[enh] Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
This weapon is Full Auto, does extra damage to Cabal, and penetrates Phalanx shields.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Increases damage against shielded targets:
‚Ä¢ 125% increase against PVE Combatant (Over)Shields
‚Ä¢ 50% increase against [barrier]Barrier Champion Shields
‚Ä¢ 20% increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with [Strand]Woven Mail
Combatant Shields include Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.
[enh] Damage Buff is increased.

Scoring 2 to 3 [Stasis]Stasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of [Stasis]Stasis Weapon Surge for [pve]11 [pvp][6] seconds. Further [Stasis]Stasis Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.
Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.
On Glacial Guard Cast:
‚Ä¢ Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
‚Ä¢ Grants the maximum 4 Stack of Weapon Surge
‚Ä¢ Applies 40 [Stasis]Slow Stacks to PvE Combatants within 7 meters
Shielded:
‚Ä¢ Grants a 100 HP Overshield [pve]that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
‚Ä¢ Prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding
‚Ä¢ Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active
‚Ä¢ Taking damage refreshes the buff duration
‚Ä¢ Class Ability activation removes the buff

Glaive Melee Kills load 1 Ammo into the Magazine from reserves. Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.
While within 15 meters of 3+ enemies:
Grants 50 Reload Speed and 100% Increased Melee Damage to Glaives.
On Projectile Kills with Glaives Matching your Subclass Element:
Enemies explode, dealing up to [pve]350 [pvp][101] damage in a 4? meter radius.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine (rounds up) and grants [enh]25 Range and Stability for your next shot within 2.5 seconds.
Only active for the first shot (of the burst).
0.3 second cooldown after activation but can activate multiple times during a slide.
[enh] Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Grants the following benefits if you have not dealt or received damage in the last 5 seconds:
‚Ä¢ 20 Range and 20 Handling
‚Ä¢ 15% decreased Draw Time on Bows
‚Ä¢ 10.78% increased damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% damage increase.
Deactivates 2 seconds after exchanging damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to [Stasis]Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.

As you drop from 113 HP to critical health:
Linearly grants up to 100 Reload Speed and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.
This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon breaking an enemy's shield or destroying a [Vehicle or Construct](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ 40 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ ?x Draw Time Multiplier
Poison final blows return ammo to the magazine.

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.
Grants Peregrine Strike after sprinting for 2 seconds and being airborne for 0.5 seconds. Buff is removed upon touching the ground.
Peregrine Strike increases the Impact Damage of Shoulder Charge Abilities by 225%.
Against [Minibosses](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) (inlcuding Champions and Tormentors), the buff is increased to 1000% and refunds your Melee Ability charge on hit.
Provides no benefits when hitting [Stasis]Frozen enemies.

On Powered Melee or Finisher Kills:
Grants [Void]Void Invisibility and restores Health, with Finishers providing a greater benefit to both.
Invisibility Duration and restored Health are based on the [rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the defeated target. [Void]Echo of Persistence increases Invisibility duration by 41.5%.
Invisibility|Health granted on Powered Melee Kills:
‚Ä¢ Minors: 6.8 seconds | 100 HP
‚Ä¢ Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8s | ? HP
‚Ä¢ Minibosses: 12.8s | ? HP
‚Ä¢ Bosses: 13.3s | 200 HP
Invisibility|Health granted on Finisher Kills:
‚Ä¢ Minors: 9.8 seconds | ? HP
‚Ä¢ Elites: 12.7 seconds | 200 HP
‚Ä¢ Minibosses: 15.8 seconds | 200 HP
‚Ä¢ Bosses: ? seconds | ? HP

Upon sliding after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds with your Class Ability fully charged:
Projects a 180¬∞ frontal shield that reflects all incoming projectiles for 0.45 seconds.
Reflected projectiles deal 50% increased damage.
After shield deactivation, 2% Class Ability energy is drained for every point of damage reflected.
Currently partially bugged and does not drain Class Ability Energy for projectiles reflected at the end of your slide.

Scoring multiple hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.
Hit requirements for activation:
‚Ä¢ Bows: 5 Hits
‚Ä¢ Swords: 10 Hits
‚Ä¢ Grenade Launchers: 12? Hits
‚Ä¢ Other: 67% of Magazine Size rounded down + 2

Precision Hits grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit for 2 seconds. Further Precision Hits refresh the duration.
Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
‚Ä¢ 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
‚Ä¢ 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
‚Ä¢ 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

While Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
Grants 25% increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing [pve]444 [pvp][162.5] damage in a ? meter radius.
Passively grants 30 Magazine Size stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)
[enh] Passively grants 5 Stability.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

While Crouched:
‚Ä¢ 30 Handling and 20 Stability
‚Ä¢ -40% Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
‚Ä¢ -80% horizontal Recoil
Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Rampage for [enh]5 seconds. Buff remains active while stowed.
Damage increase at 1|2|3 Stacks: 10%|21%|33.1%
[enh] Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Damaging a combatant heals the wielder.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

While Aiming Down Sights with [Arc]Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Kills with this weapon cause enemy targets to detonate and spawn Void projectiles that track targets.

Grants the following to [Solar]Solar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
‚Ä¢ 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
‚Ä¢ 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
‚Ä¢ 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.
Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for [enh]2.75 seconds.
Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.
Activation progress on Precision Hits:
‚Ä¢ Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
‚Ä¢ Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
‚Ä¢ Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%
[enh] Buff duration is increased by 0.25 seconds.

Direct Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on Bows). Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.
Precision Damage Increase at 1|2|... Stacks:
[enh]5% | 10% | 15% | 20% | 25% | 30%
(More precisely: [enh]30% / 6 √ó [Stacks])
[enh] Precision Damage Buff is increased by 20%.

1 second after stowing [Stasis]Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.
Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While at/above 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 40 [Stasis]Slow Stacks for [pve]4 [pvp][1.5] seconds ([pve]8 [pvp][2] with [Stasis]Whisper of Durance) to enemies within 4 meters.
Only activates once per shot/burst.
[enh] Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 5 seconds:
‚Ä¢ 15% increased damage
‚Ä¢ Maximized Movement Speed
Remains active even if stowed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for [pve]5 [pvp][3] seconds.
Duration cannot be refreshed.
Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
‚Ä¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
‚Ä¢ Sidearms: 12
‚Ä¢ SMGs: 13
Powered Melee Hits make you and allies within 8 meters [Solar]Radiant for 8 seconds (12 with [Solar]Ember of Solace).

Targets killed by [Solar]Solar Supers [Solar]Ignite and spawn a [Solar]Firesprite at their location.
Deadshot Golden Gun refunds 1 ammo per kill.
Note: [Solar]Well of Radiance makes all of the caster's Weapon Damage count as Super Ability Damage so [Solar]Solar Weapons Kills will also count as [Solar]Solar Super Kills.

[Solar]Solar Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Ember of Tempering for 8 seconds to you and allies within 12.5 meters.
[Solar]Ember of Tempering grants the following benefits:
‚Ä¢ 10|20|30 Recovery at 1|2|3 Stacks
‚Ä¢ 20 Airborne Effectiveness
‚Ä¢ [Solar]Solar Weapon Kills spawn a [Solar]Firesprite

[Solar]Ignitions apply 40 [Solar]Scorch Stacks (60 with [Solar]Ember of Ashes) to enemies damaged by the explosion.
Does not apply to the [Solar]Ignited enemy.

Applying certain buffs to allies grants 400% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate for [pve]6 [pvp][3] seconds.
Activation Triggers:
‚Ä¢ Granting the [Solar]Cure, [Solar]Radiant, or [Solar]Restoration [Solar]Solar subclass buffs to allies
‚Ä¢ Healing (from most sources), or reviving allies
Will NOT trigger [Solar]Ember of Benevolence:
Empowering Rifts, Mods, Crest of Alpha Lupi's Healing Pulse, and Aeon Sect of Vigor's Healing

Grants 300% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 3 seconds upon applying [Solar]Scorch to enemies.
Will not activate if the enemy dies from the hit that would have applied [Solar]Scorch.

[Solar]Solar Kills extend the duration of [Solar]Restoration and [Solar]Radiant effects up to the maximum of 15 seconds.
Time added based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 2 seconds
‚Ä¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 3s
‚Ä¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Enemy Players: 4s
‚Ä¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elies, and higher: 8s

Solar Super projectiles home in on enemies.
Only affects Blade Barrage and Daybreak projectiles.

[Solar]Restoration and [Solar]Radiant effects applied to you last 50% longer.
Specific increases from [Solar]Ember of Solace for [Solar]Restoration and [Solar]Radiant sources can be found in their descriptions.

[Solar]Ignition Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed targets:
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
‚Ä¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12.25%
‚Ä¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 16.5%
‚Ä¢ Players: 20.75%
‚Ä¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Successive Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a ramping Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits (20% on SMGs). Missing deactivates the buff.
Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.
% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.33%
All thresholds are increased by 60% for Submachine Guns, initially triggering at 20% and maxing out at 176.53%.
Damage Buff ramps up from [pve]16.73% [pvp][10.46%] to [pve]40% [pvp][25%] upon reaching maximum strength.
Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a [pve]25% [pvp][15.85%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.
Radar immediately returns once no longer Aiming Down Sights. (Normally takes 1.5 seconds)

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.
Grenade Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
[pve]12% [pvp][6%] | [pve]17% [pvp][8.5%] | [pve]20% [pvp][10%]

Hybrid melee/ranged polearm with a frontal shield.
Generates energy on dealing ranged damage.
[Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield, depleting energy over time
[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.
Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.
If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.
